name: Owari
description: Owari is a variant of Mancala where players strategically attempt to capture stones from their opponent's row.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium 4 or later (w/ SSE2) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 136 MB available space Additional Notes: 64 bit required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
